data.actual_result: You can only change the setting using the name but not on the option boxes
data.expected_result: You should be able to change the setting using the option boxes
data.short_description: Changing server notification settings by the option boxes doesn't work
data.steps_to_repro: - Open up server notification settings - Change the notification settings using the option boxes on the very right - They act like check boxes and settings won't change - They won't get unselected either - It will only be changed when clicking on the desired option's name and description
